pages.text: To open the config gui of a Tech Door $(thing)[Sneak + Right Click]$() it while holding a $(l:machine_mechanics#wrench)'Wrench'$(/l). The doors have 3 modes: $(thing)'manual'$(), $(thing)'redstone controlled'$() or $(thing)'automatic'$(). A manual door needs to be opened by $(thing)'right-clicking'$() it, an automatic door reacts to players nearby. A redstone controlled door can be $(l:machine_mechanics#redstone)configured like machines$(/l). The signal can come from all sides.

pages.title: Security & Modes
pages.text: Doors can be configured to $(l:machine_mechanics#security)security settings$(/l) like machines. Security settings are only relevant for 'Manual' and 'Automatic' mode, while redstone control is only needed in 'Redstone' mode. Auto-Close is only used in 'Manual' mode and closes the door 5 seconds after opening.
